title: Ralphie Endowment
description: To provide support for  the cost of housing, and caring for and handling Ralphie, the mascot buffalo used by the University of Colorado Athletic Department and to promote and market Ralphie for the betterment of CU Athletics.
marketingContent: To provide support for the cost of housing, and caring for and handling Ralphie, the mascot buffalo used by the University of Colorado Athletic Department and to promote and market Ralphie for the betterment of CU Athletics.
